Nightlight:

Nightlight started breathing hard "Look out... look out" she said 
anxously, with fear and with out wake up.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He picked her up and brought her inside to her room with the 
door torn 
> open.  She didn't appear damaged but she was out cold.  He placed 
her on the 
> bed and sat by to watch.
